DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigator-initiated study compare new bone formation histomorphometric analysis follow maxillary sinus augmentation use two different bone graft material . A total twenty , sinus augmentation via lateral approach perform subject require sinus augmentation implant placement randomly divide 2 group . These subject receive one two different bone graft material : 1 ) Anorganic bovine bone matrix- InterOss ( Group A ) , 2 ) Anorganic bovine bone matrix- Bio-oss ( Group B ) . At time implant placement ( eight month sinus augmentation procedure ) , two bone biopsy collect augmented site histomorphometric analysis . The percentage vital bone measure analyze statistically , also follow measure : percentage non-vital bone , percentage non-bone material ( xenograft ) , percentage connective tissue .
DOC.brief_title: A Histomorphometric Analysis Following Sinus Augmentation Using Two Different Bone Graft Materials .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Over 18 year old able read sign inform consent form . 2 . Patient good oral hygiene ( Fullmouth plaque score < 25 % ) . 3 . Subject would available study monitor followup visit . 4 . Patients miss teeth maxillary posterior region require sinus augmentation implant placement . The patient may partially completely edentulous . 5 . Patient candidate delay implant placement approximately 8 month follow sinus graft 1 . Alcohol , drug dependency . 2 . Signs symptoms chronic maxillary sinus disease . 3 . Current smoker . 4 . History head neck radiation treatment . 5 . Poor health , condition like uncontrolled diabetes , uncontrolled hypertension uncontrolled systemic disease . 6 . Physical psychological reason might affect surgical procedure subsequent prosthodontic treatment and/or require followup examination . 7 . Also , subject nurse pregnant exclude study .
